Changelog
=========

.. include:: includes/all.rst

**debops.saslauthd**

This project adheres to `Semantic Versioning <http://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html>`__
and `human-readable changelog <http://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/>`__.

The current role maintainer_ is drybjed_.


`debops.saslauthd master`_ - unreleased
---------------------------------------

.. _debops.saslauthd master: https://github.com/debops/ansible-saslauthd/compare/v0.1.1...master


`debops.saslauthd v0.1.1`_ - 2017-09-04
---------------------------------------

.. _debops.saslauthd v0.1.1: https://github.com/debops/ansible-saslauthd/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

Changed
~~~~~~~

- Enable Postfix support if host is in the ``[debops_service_postfix]`` Ansible
  inventory group. [drybjed_]


debops.saslauthd v0.1.0 - 2017-09-04
------------------------------------

Added
~~~~~

- Initial release. [drybjed_]
